mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.passengers, d.id AS d_id, d.name AS d_name, cu.id AS cu_id, cu.name AS cu_name FROM cars AS c INNER JOIN drivers AS d ON c.id = d.cars_id LEFT OUTER JOIN customers AS cu ON c.id = cu.cars_id WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cars (id, name, passengers) VALUES (nextval('car_id_seq'), #{name}, #{passengers})
mapper.update: UPDATE cars SET name = #{name}, passengers = #{passengers} WHERE id = #{id}
